keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCPAR

Class Literal

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCPAR.Literal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class Literal
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    Class to store a Literal. It is almost the same as an Item, but it also stores the item's gain, which is calculated by the FOIL method.
    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jesus Alcal√° (University of Granada) 09/02/2010

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object a)
        Function neccessary to sort literals. It sorts in a decreasing gain order
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
        Parameters:
        a - Literal object to compare with.
        Returns:
        1 if a is bigger, -1 if smaller and 0 otherwise.
